Equipment
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Property (Items/Equipment): Equipment
  • Beginner April 23 - 11:58 am

  • Middle April 23 - 12:01 pm

  • Master April 23 - 11:31 am

  • Legend April 21 - 12:19 pm

  • Illegal June 12 - 05:57 am

***Page Under Construction***

One piece of equipment can be placed on each monster before an adventure or event battle. The equipment comes in broad groups such as Beginner, Middle, Master, Legend, and Illegal. The first four groups are comprised of equipment characterized by color, type, and level. The equipment's type determines its primary affect, the equipment's color determines the group from which its secondary affects are drawn, and the equipment's level determines the strength (and specific secondary effect) of all affects. Illegal equipment is not actually illegal, and differs from the other category in that it tends to be very powerful and is not broken down into levels like the other equipment sets.

Equipment can be found in chests or after battles during an adventure, or created by using recipes in the Combine menu at some item shops.
